body: Please, inform your manager **at least 4 weeks in  advance** before leaving the Ministry of Justice to allow time for a timely handover.

components.html: It is important that this form is filled in at least 3 days before the contractor or permanent employee leaves the Ministry of Justice.

heading: MOJ Leavers form
lede: This form is important to ensure that our inventory is kept up-to-date. It needs to be completed before a contractor or permanent employee leaves the Ministry of Justice.
